content: skill level easy measurements top s = 32/33 inches m = 34/35 inches l = 36/37 inches xl = 38/39 inches bottom/hips s = 34 inches m = 36 inches l = 38 inches xl = 40 inches materials - elann com esprit 50 g per ball 2 balls of capri blue #2499 mc - elann com esprit 50 g per ball 1 ball of rosetta #3853 cc - us g6/4 00 mm crochet hook or hook needed to obtain gauge - us #2 crochet hook or any smaller hook gauge with larger hook 1 motif/square equals 2x2 inches relaxed 2 ½ x 2 ½ inches stretched 11 sts and 5 row = 2x2 inches
